00047 stack<SignalHandler::Action> SignalHandler::smActions[NSIGNALS];
00048 
00052 SignalHandler::SignalType SignalHandler::convertFromNativeSignal(int inSignal)
00053 {
00054     SignalType lType;
00055     switch(inSignal) {
00056 #ifdef PACC_USE_WINDOWS
00057         case SIGABRT: lType = eSigAbrt; break;
00058         case SIGFPE:  lType = eSigFPE; break;
00059         case SIGILL:  lType = eSigIll; break;
00060         case SIGINT:  lType = eSigInt; break;
00061         case SIGSEGV: lType = eSigSegV; break;
00062         case SIGTERM: lType = eSigTerm; break;
00063         default:
00064             throw runtime_error("SignalHandler::convertFromNativeSignal() signal not supported by Windows!");
00065 #else
00066         case SIGHUP:  lType = eSigHUp; break;
00067         case SIGINT:  lType = eSigInt; break;
00068         case SIGQUIT: lType = eSigQuit; break;
00069         case SIGILL:  lType = eSigIll; break;
00070         case SIGTRAP: lType = eSigTrap; break;
00071         case SIGABRT: lType = eSigAbrt; break;
00072         case SIGFPE:  lType = eSigFPE; break;
00073         case SIGKILL: lType = eSigKill; break;
00074         case SIGSEGV: lType = eSigSegV; break;
00075         case SIGPIPE: lType = eSigPipe; break;
00076         case SIGALRM: lType = eSigAlrm; break;
00077         case SIGTERM: lType = eSigTerm; break;
00078         case SIGSTOP: lType = eSigStop; break;
00079         case SIGTSTP: lType = eSigTStp; break;
00080         case SIGCONT: lType = eSigCont; break;
00081         case SIGCHLD: lType = eSigChld; break;
00082         case SIGTTIN: lType = eSigTTin; break;
00083         case SIGTTOU: lType = eSigTTou; break;
00084         case SIGUSR1: lType = eSigUsr1; break;
00085         case SIGUSR2: lType = eSigUsr2; break;
00086         default:
00087             throw runtime_error("SignalHandler::convertFromNativeSignal() unknown POSIX signal!");
00088 #endif
00089     }
00090     return lType;
00091 }
00092 
00096 int SignalHandler::convertToNativeSignal(SignalHandler::SignalType inType)
00097 {
00098     int lSignal;
00099     switch(inType) {
00100 #ifdef PACC_USE_WINDOWS
00101         case eSigAbrt: lSignal = SIGABRT; break;
00102         case eSigFPE:  lSignal = SIGFPE; break;
00103         case eSigIll:  lSignal = SIGILL; break;
00104         case eSigInt:  lSignal = SIGINT; break;
00105         case eSigSegV: lSignal = SIGSEGV; break;
00106         case eSigTerm: lSignal = SIGTERM; break;
00107         default:
00108             throw runtime_error("SignalHandler::convertToNativeSignal() signal not supported by Windows!");
00109 #else
00110         case eSigHUp:  lSignal = SIGHUP; break;
00111         case eSigInt:  lSignal = SIGINT; break;
00112         case eSigQuit: lSignal = SIGQUIT; break;
00113         case eSigIll:  lSignal = SIGILL; break;
00114         case eSigTrap: lSignal = SIGTRAP; break;
00115         case eSigAbrt: lSignal = SIGABRT; break;
00116         case eSigFPE:  lSignal = SIGFPE; break;
00117         case eSigKill: lSignal = SIGKILL; break;
00118         case eSigSegV: lSignal = SIGSEGV; break;
00119         case eSigPipe: lSignal = SIGPIPE; break;
00120         case eSigAlrm: lSignal = SIGALRM; break;
00121         case eSigTerm: lSignal = SIGTERM; break;
00122         case eSigStop: lSignal = SIGSTOP; break;
00123         case eSigTStp: lSignal = SIGTSTP; break;
00124         case eSigCont: lSignal = SIGCONT; break;
00125         case eSigChld: lSignal = SIGCHLD; break;
00126         case eSigTTin: lSignal = SIGTTIN; break;
00127         case eSigTTou: lSignal = SIGTTOU; break;
00128         case eSigUsr1: lSignal = SIGUSR1; break;
00129         case eSigUsr2: lSignal = SIGUSR2; break;
00130         default:
00131             throw runtime_error("SignalHandler::convertToNativeSignal() unknown POSIX signal!");
00132 #endif
00133     }
00134     return lSignal;
00135 }

00142 void SignalHandler::popAction(SignalHandler::SignalType inType)
00143 {
00144     int lSignal = convertToNativeSignal(inType);
00145     PACC_AssertM(!smActions[inType].empty(), "popAction() stack is empty!");
00146     smActions[inType].pop();
00147     PACC_AssertM(!smActions[inType].empty(), "popAction() stack is empty!");
00148     HandlerPointer lFunc;
00149     if(smActions[inType].top().mHandler == 0) {
00150         // action must be external function
00151         lFunc = ::signal(lSignal, smActions[inType].top().mFunc);
00152     } else {
00153         // action is custom
00154         lFunc = ::signal(lSignal, runAction);
00155     }
00156     PACC_AssertM(lFunc != SIG_ERR, "popAction() internal error: invalid signal") 
00157 }
00158 
00162 void SignalHandler::pushAction(SignalHandler::SignalType inType)
00163 {
00164     PACC_AssertM(!smActions[inType].empty(), "pushAction() stack is empty, set an action first!");
00165     smActions[inType].push(smActions[inType].top());
00166 }
00167 
00171 void SignalHandler::runAction(int inSignal)
00172 {
00173     SignalType lType = convertFromNativeSignal(inSignal);
00174     PACC_AssertM(!smActions[lType].empty(), "runAction() internal error, stack is empty!");
00175     PACC_AssertM(smActions[lType].top().mHandler != 0, "runAction() internal error: no handler specified!");
00176     smActions[lType].top().mHandler->main(lType);
00177 }
00178 
00184 void SignalHandler::setCustomAction(SignalHandler::SignalType inType)
00185 {
00186     // set new action
00187     int lSignal = convertToNativeSignal(inType);
00188     HandlerPointer lFunc = ::signal(lSignal, runAction);
00189     PACC_AssertM(lFunc != SIG_ERR, "setCustomAction() internal error: invalid signal");
00190     // update action stack
00191     Action lCustom(this, 0);
00192     if(smActions[inType].empty()) {
00193         // initialize the action stack
00194         smActions[inType].push(Action(0, lFunc));
00195         smActions[inType].push(lCustom);
00196     } else {
00197         // overwrite the top action
00198         smActions[inType].top() = lCustom;
00199     }
00200 }
00201 
00207 void SignalHandler::setDefaultAction(SignalHandler::SignalType inType)
00208 {
00209     int lSignal = convertToNativeSignal(inType);
00210     HandlerPointer lFunc = ::signal(lSignal, SIG_DFL);
00211     PACC_AssertM(lFunc != SIG_ERR, "setDefaultAction() internal error: invalid signal");
00212     Action lCustom(0, SIG_DFL);
00213     if(smActions[inType].empty()) {
00214         // initialize the action stack
00215         smActions[inType].push(Action(0, lFunc));
00216         smActions[inType].push(lCustom);
00217     } else {
00218         // overwrite the top action
00219         smActions[inType].top() = lCustom;
00220     }
00221 }
00222 
00228 void SignalHandler::setIgnoreAction(SignalHandler::SignalType inType)
00229 {
00230     int lSignal = convertToNativeSignal(inType);
00231     HandlerPointer lFunc = ::signal(lSignal, SIG_IGN);
00232     PACC_AssertM(lFunc != SIG_ERR, "setIgnoreAction() internal error: invalid signal");
00233     Action lCustom(0, SIG_IGN);
00234     if(smActions[inType].empty()) {
00235         // initialize the action stack
00236         smActions[inType].push(Action(0, lFunc));
00237         smActions[inType].push(lCustom);
00238     } else {
00239         // overwrite the top action
00240         smActions[inType].top() = lCustom;
00241     }
00242 }
